func_sig.description: Calculate the area of various shapes given their dimensions.
func_sig.name: calculate_area_of_shapes

dimensions.description: Dimensions of the shape (e.g., radius for circle, length & width for rectangle).

func_sig.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given its base and height.
func_sig.name: calculate_area_of_triangle

base.description: The length of the base of the triangle.
